CustomField.formula: (IF( ISPICKVAL( Offer_Additional_Assistance__c, "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( Offer_Additional_Assistance__c, "N/A") , 1, 0 ) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Closing_Statement__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( Closing_Statement__c, "N/A") , 1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Proper_Disconnect__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( Proper_Disconnect__c, "N/A"), 1, 0)) / 3
CustomField.label: Closing Total % (Phone)
